welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hagonoy, Philippines! This charming city is known for its beautiful beaches, delicious seafood, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Hagonoy has to offer.

restaurants.name: Santos Lechon Manok Seafoods and Grill
restaurants.description: Santos Lechon Manok Seafoods and Grill is a filipino restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Upperfarm Steakhouse
restaurants.description: Upperfarm Steakhouse is a steakhouse located in the city.

restaurants.name: Prangels  Snack Inn Digos
restaurants.description: Prangels  Snack Inn Digos is a fast food restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Balutakay Bulaloan Digos
restaurants.description: Balutakay Bulaloan Digos is a restaurant located in Digos City.

restaurants.name: Jollibee
restaurants.description: Jollibee is a fast food restaurant located in City of Digos.
restaurants.address: Estrada Public Market Quezon Ave., Digos City, 8002 Digos City, Davao del Sur

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it primarily serves international flights for Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights for multiple airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, it serves domestic flights for multiple airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slow and unreliable at times.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Subic Bay International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Subic Bay International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
